import React from 'react'; import { Card } from '@mui/material'; // Import Card component from your UI library import campechana from "../assets/campechana.png"; // Import your food image import Grid from "@mui/material/Grid"; import FavoriteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Favorite'; const FoodCard = ({ title, oldPrice, newPrice, description }) => { return (

{description}

{title}
{oldPrice}

{newPrice}
); }; export default FoodCard;
